text: Daga kare no min no naka fushinjin'na shucho-tachi wa itta. `Anata o miru to, watashi-tachi to onaji ningen ni sugimasen. Mata watashi-tachi no naka demo anata ni shitagau mono wa, shiryo no mijukuna mo iyashi mono ni sugimasen. Mata anata ni wa, watashi-tachi ni masaru chosho mo mitome raremasen. Iya, watashi-tachi wa, jissai anata gata o uso-tsukidearu to kangaemasu
